# Contributing

The project is built with nuxt.js an amazing vue.js framework, if you have discovered a bug or have a feature suggestion, feel free to create an issue on GitHub. You don't need to be assigned an issue in order to work on itâ€”consider all issues free rein.

If you'd like to make some changes yourself, see the following:

1. Make sure yarn is globally installed (`npm install -g yarn`)
2. Run `yarn` to download required packages
3. Build and start the application: `yarn dev`
4. Finally, submit a [pull request](https://help.github.com/articles/creating-a-pull-request-from-a-fork/) with your changes!
